fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Reveal yourself as the Mayor during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you reveal yourself, it will be announced to the Town.
- While revealed, your vote counts as three, you cannot send or receive whispers, and Town roles with abilities that grant defense without counterattacking will not be able to use those abilities on you.
- You may only reveal yourself once.
